p: The African green monkey kidney epithelial (Vero E6) cells and the human hepatocellular carcinoma (Huh-7) cells were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Gibco, USA) supplemented with 10 % fetal bovine serum (FBS) at 37 °C. A clinical isolated SARS-CoV-2 virus (Genebank accession no. MT123290.1) was propagated in Vero E6 cells, and viral titer was determined by 50 % tissue culture infective dose (TCID 50) according to the cytopathic effect by use of Reed-Muench method [ 17]. All the infection experiments were performed in a biosafety level-3 (BLS-3) laboratory.
